metadata.title: CVE-2018-1046 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: pdns before version 4.1.2 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in dnsreplay.In the dnsreplay tool provided with PowerDNS Authoritative, replaying aspecially crafted PCAP file can trigger a stack-based buffer overflow,leading to a crash and potentially arbitrary code execution. This bufferoverflow only occurs when the -ecs-stamp option of dnsreplay is used.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
